label: Width
name: width
description: Width of balancing-act iFrame in CSS compliant format. Default: "500px"

label: Minimum width
name: minWidth
description: Minimum width of balancing-act iFrame in CSS compliant format. Default: "300px"

label: Height
name: height
description: Height of balancing-act iFrame in CSS compliant format. Default: "500px"

name: resizeSupported
label: Resize supported
description: If enabled, fullscreen button will be displayed, and H5P will be resized to fit its surroundings
